tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_currency_transfers (
	transfer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	from_wallet_id INT,
	to_wallet_id INT,
	amount DECIMAL,
	transfer_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  balance DECIMAL(10, 2) DEFAULT 0
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_wallet_id INT,
    receiver_wallet_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(15, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE Wallets (   wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   user_id INT NOT NULL,   currency_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,   balance DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Transactions (   transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   from_wallet INT NOT NULL,   to_wallet INT NOT NULL,   amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,   transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE Users (   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,   email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,   created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE CurrencyTypes (   currency_type VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,   description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    wallet_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    balance INT DEFAULT 0,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_wallet_id UUID,
    receiver_wallet_id UUID,
    amount INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW(),
    FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id)
);

CREATE TABLE wallet_currency (
    wallet_id UUID,
    currency_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (wallet_id) REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (currency_id) REFERENCES currency_types(currency_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (wallet_id, currency_id)
);
